attributes.action: Hold parliament in contempt for ignoring the will of the people
attributes.background: The UK government asked the population to decide if they wanted to leave the EU on the 23rd of June 2016. The population voted by a mojority of 52% to 48% to leave. The government and parliament have completely disregarded this desision by the members deciding on what terms.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387
